landing_hero_title: Create Your Construction Quotes in a Few Clicks
landing_hero_subtitle: Import your plans, automatically generate measurements, and produce professional quotes. Multi-company SaaS solution for construction professionals.
landing_features_title: Everything You Need for Your Quotes
feature_plans_desc: Import your PDF or DWG/DXF plans. Calibrate the scale and trace areas to automatically calculate measurements.
feature_bpu_desc: Country-specific, customizable price library. Manage your price ranges (Eco, Standard, Premium) with coefficients.
feature_quotes_desc: Generate versioned quotes with PDF and Excel exports. Automatic calculation of totals (HT/VAT/TTC).
feature_questions_desc: Collect missing information: ceiling height, joinery, coatings, air conditioning, swimming pool...
feature_users_desc: Manage your team with roles: Admin, Quantity Surveyor, Sales, Read-only. Granular permissions.
feature_countries_desc: Multi-currency support and country-specific BPU libraries: Morocco, France, Tunisia, Algeria, Senegal, Ivory Coast.
landing_cta_bottom_desc: Join hundreds of professionals using DevisPro to save time and produce accurate quotes.
